Detailed Description

Implements "Alternate Geometry" in pre-TriAx weight mapped figures.

NEEDS DOCUMENTATION.

Loads the Element's Properties, Data items, Children, Label, Property groups, and Script from the native file format.

void DzLegacyAlternateGeometry::postLoadFile ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [virtual]

Executes the element's load script if it has one. Also provides backwards compatibility for loading old native files.

Parameters:
file The file that this object was read from.

Reimplemented from DzElement.

void DzLegacyAlternateGeometry::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Classes that contain items derived from DzStorable should override this method to give them a chance to set their storage path. The path passed is relative (no leading drive letter or root path).

Parameters:
path The base path for storables.

Reimplemented from DzBase.
